doctor.name: Dr. Fazley Rabby
doctor.info: Dr. Fazley Rabby is a Eye Specialist in Pabna. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), FCPS (EYE), MCPS (EYE), ICO (UK). He is a Resident Surgeon, Eye at National Institute of Ophthalmology & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Shimla Hospital, Pabna. Practicing hour of Dr. Fazley Rabby at Shimla Hospital, Pabna is 4pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).

Aminur Rashid Akonda at Shimla Hospital, Pabna is 3pm to 9pm (Sat, Sun & Wed).

doctor.name: Dr. Al Mamun
doctor.info: Dr. Al Mamun is a Eye Specialist in Pabna. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), FCPS (Eye), ICO (UK). He is working as a Eye Specialist & Surgeon doctor in Kushtia Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Pabna Eye Hospital & Phaco Center. Practicing hour of Dr. Al Mamun at Pabna Eye Hospital & Phaco Center is 9am to 2pm & 4pm to 8pm (Everyday).
